re : oil and gas dispatch
what we need to do is set up a pool for the gas and a pool for the oil .
each group can be scheduled independently . if we run out of gas , shut down the
oil . if we run out of oil , shut down the gas .
we need to be able to do that on a daily basis .

cash flow is better
i understand that we have scheduled some pipe in the future and i think that we should take a very hard look at that .
there is a 30 day lag between us scheduling the pipe and the shipper being able to place gas into the line .
this lag is in place so that we do not have to pay early termination fees .
